Agents.Name: Loki
Agents.Description: The Norse gods of mischief, trickery and fire.

Agents.Name: Thor
Agents.Description: The Norse gods of thunder, lightning and storms.

Agents.Name: Odin
Agents.Description: The Norse king of the gods.

Agents.Name: Zeus
Agents.Description: The Greek god of the sky and ruler of the Olympian gods.

Agents.Name: Hera
Agents.Description: The Greek goddes of family, marriage, and childbirth.

Agents.Name: Poseidon
Agents.Description: The Greek god of the sea, earthquakes, storms, and horses.

Agents.Name: Demeter
Agents.Description: The Greek goddess of agriculture, fertility, and the harvest.

Agents.Name: Ares
Agents.Description: The Greek god of war, bloodshed, and violence.

Agents.Name: Aphrodite
Agents.Description: The Greek goddess of love, beauty, and desire.

Agents.Name: Hermes
Agents.Description: The Greek god of boundaries, travel, communication, trade, language, and writing.

Agents.Name: Hephaestus
Agents.Description: The Greek god of fire, metalworking, and crafts.

Agents.Name: Dionysus
Agents.Description: The Greek god of wine, parties and festivals, madness, chaos, drunkenness, drugs, and ecstasy.

Agents.Name: Hades
Agents.Description: The Greek god of the underworld and the dead.

Agents.Name: Artemis
Agents.Description: The Greek goddess of the hunt, wild animals, wilderness, childbirth, and virginity.

Agents.Name: Apollo
Agents.Description: The Greek god of music, poetry, art, oracles, archery, plague, medicine, sun, light, and knowledge.

Agents.Name: Athena
Agents.Description: The Greek goddess of wisdom, handicraft, and warfare.
